itinerary.activity: Meet at South Lake Union Park
itinerary.description: Start your day by meeting at South Lake Union Park. Enjoy the scenic view and warm up for the day.
itinerary.location: South Lake Union Park, 860 Terry Ave N, Seattle, WA 98109

itinerary.description: Ride your rental scooters/bikes to the Museum of History & Industry (MOHAI). Note: You won't be entering the museum in this plan.
itinerary.location: Museum of History & Industry, 860 Terry Ave N, Seattle, WA 98109

itinerary.activity: Explore Lake Union's Cheshiahud Lake Union Loop
itinerary.description: Follow the Cheshiahud Lake Union Loop trail, stop at various points to enjoy the view and take pictures.
itinerary.location: Cheshiahud Lake Union Loop, Seattle, WA 98109

itinerary.description: Stop for a casual lunch at Daniel's Broiler. Enjoy the lake view while you eat.
itinerary.location: Daniel's Broiler, 809 Fairview Pl N, Seattle, WA 98109

itinerary.description: Ride your rental scooters/bikes to Cherry Street Coffee. Prepare for a friendly game of Monopoly.
itinerary.location: Cherry Street Coffee, 2719 1st Ave, Seattle, WA 98121

itinerary.activity: Play Monopoly at Cherry Street Coffee
itinerary.description: Get competitive with a group game of Monopoly while enjoying a coffee or tea.
itinerary.location: Cherry Street Coffee, 2719 1st Ave, Seattle, WA 98121

itinerary.activity: Ride back to South Lake Union Park
itinerary.description: End the day with a relaxing ride back to South Lake Union Park.
itinerary.location: South Lake Union Park, 860 Terry Ave N, Seattle, WA 98109
